summary: Restructure an existing React + Vite dark-neon portfolio frontend into a cleaner, Next.js-like folder organization (without using Next.js) while preserving all UI, animations, content, section IDs, and smooth-scroll behavior.
architectural_notes: Do not use Next.js; keep React + Vite.
Preserve all existing styling/theme, animations, content, section IDs, and smooth-scroll behavior during refactor.

existing_features.title:
Restructure the frontend source tree to match the requested organization by moving existing components (no logic/style/content changes):
- Create `frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx`
- Create `frontend/src/components/` and move `Navbar` and `Footer` into it
- Create `frontend/src/sections/` and move the existing section components into it: `Hero`, `About`, `Services`, `Works`, `GetCode`, `Contact`
- Move any shared marketing-only components used by sections (e.g., `MotionHeading`, `MotionReveal`, `CodeBlockWithCopy`, `scroll` utility) into an appropriate place under `frontend/src/components/` so imports remain clean and build passes
- Update all import paths affected by file moves

Create `frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx` that renders the section components in this exact order: Hero → About → Services → Works → GetCode → Contact. Ensure it renders only composition/layout and does not alter section markup, props, content, styling, or animations.

Update `frontend/src/App.tsx` to render exactly:
- `<Navbar />`
- `<HomePage />`
- `<Footer />`
while preserving the existing wrapper structure/classes (e.g., the current dark background wrapper) and without changing UI/behavior.

Preserve all section IDs and smooth-scroll navigation behavior after the refactor. Ensure `Navbar` navigation continues to scroll smoothly to `home`, `about`, `services`, `works`, `get-code`, and `contact` and that focus management still works.

Provide updated file contents for all modified and newly created frontend files affected by this restructure (including `App.tsx`, `pages/HomePage.tsx`, moved `Navbar`/`Footer`, moved sections, and any moved shared components/utilities) so the refactor can be applied directly.

new_feature_requests.summary: Reorganize src into pages/HomePage.tsx, components (Navbar/Footer/shared UI), and sections (Hero/About/Services/Works/GetCode/Contact) with updated imports and no behavior/UI changes.
Create src/pages/HomePage.tsx that composes sections in order: Hero → About → Services → Works → GetCode → Contact.
Update App.tsx to render <Navbar /><HomePage /><Footer /> while preserving smooth-scroll navigation and section IDs.

projectName: Restructure React (Vite) frontend into pages/components/sections without UI changes
